title: Tab Font way too big
content: I was trying to increase the size font on the browsing tabs and accidentally typed in 23 and now the entire browser screen is zoomed in so large I can't even scroll or undo what I've done. I had to do a force quit of the the browser. I tried deleting Firefox and reinstalled and it now still loads with zoomed in font. I can't even use Firefox as my browser. Matter of fact I'm having to submit this question on a different browser. Please advise.
creator: crbisiar64

title: Pagina de inicio de Mozilla
content: Buenas tengan todos los que hacen posible el programa Mozilla y colaboradores. Tengo una peque√±a pregunta y es una duda que tengo, no se si se trata de la configuracion de mi navegador o si es un error o un cambio que le hicieron a una nueva version de mozilla, pero el caso es que en la pagina de inicio pongo el cursor del mouse en la barra que esta en el centro de la pagina y escribo lo que quiero buscar y en vez de aparecer ahi en el centro donde estoy escribiendo me aparece en la barra de direcciones URL en la parte de arriba de la pagina de inicio y donde estoy escribiendo en el centro queda en blanco. Mi pregunta: a que se debe y como puedo solucionarlo, para que me aparesca en el centro y no arriba. Gracias.
creator: delgiudice.miguel

title: On startup master password rejects until all 10 tabs are done loading
content: I have 10 tabs that open on startup. The master password prompts comes up before all ten tabs are loaded. When I enter master password while tabs are loading I get a reject that password is wrong. I watch and each keystroke does display the astrick as I type in the password field. If I just wait until all tabs are loaded and enter password all is well, no rejected password. Computer is a Dell with Intel Core I5 3.20 GHz 8GB memory 4 processors. Now in Firefox 93, but at has done this for many past releases and WIndows 10 Pro. It don't really bother me since I put up with it for a long time, but have wondered if anyone else has seen this and if there is a setting I have wrong. Maybe on a rare occasion I won't get a reject while tabs are loading.
creator: diverjer

title: printing
content: I absolutely hate the the narrow print bar how do I get the system dialog to be my default?
